short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure multiple email forwarding for Gmail, never store mails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safely forward multiple Gmail emails with one click. 
Securely transfer or migrate your Gmail emails. 
Never store any email information. 
Each email is forwarded independently, with the same original content.
